title: Lag of Legends
body: Recently ever since the new patch hit I've been getting a lot of lag with ping ranging from 200-500 ms. Of course, I thought I might just be having internet issues and such but it seems almost every game I go in someone else has it worst with 500-1000 (or even more) ping. I might just be stupid and this is probably something that ALWAYS happens but for me it started when patch 6.24 hit. Any thoughts?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

Hi there,

There are three things I'd like to address:

1. I hope this is the link for the WinMTR you were looking for: [WinMTR](http://pastebin.com/RTL1QZpQ)
2. I was unable to work with ICSI netalyzr because I can't find the "Start Analysis" link.
3. After an update happened on my PC I have had less problems concerning the issue, not gone but significantly less.

**Edit:** Can anyone see the link? I can't, but I definitely posted it.
**Edit 2:** Is it okay if I just copy and paste the results? Because I don't think the link is really there.

Sincerest apologies for the delayed response.
I went ahead and fixed your link for you, feel free to open the edit dialog on your post to see what your problem was :)

Are you still experiencing this issue?

From your WinMTR results i can see some clear packet loss along the route to the servers, although minimal this may be the cause of your issues. I would recommend contacting your ISP regarding this.

On the subject of the ICSI netalyzr and the issues you're facing running the actual test, would you be able to try running the [commandline client](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/cli.html) for the test, let me know if this works.

I thought I was the only one, I just went on a pretty bad losing streak because of these lag spikes.

Get yo shit together rito ffs
Yep, experiencing the same thing a long with a lot of people I've messaged in game.
